channel.title: for-loop on Pete Talbert
channel.description: Recent content in for-loop on Pete Talbert

item.title: For loops for quick summaries in R
item.description: Because I often work with categorical data, I find myself making lots of quick, sorted counts of variables in a dataset. I find that this is a really common technique to get to know a dataset you’re working with; I’ve also noticed David Robinson do it often in his screencasts.

item.title: Learning For Loops in R
item.description: I’m very much a beginner when it comes to any formal programming. So I feel like my first real practice should be with for loops, which are a staple of programming concepts.
